game.name: Schedule I
game.genres: 액션, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: From small-time dope pusher to kingpin - manufacture and distribute a range of drugs throughout the grungy city of Hyland Point. Expand your empire with properties, businesses, employees and more.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From small-time dope pusher to kingpin - manufacture and distribute a range of drugs throughout the grungy city of Hyland Point. Expand your empire with properties, businesses, employees and more.
